name: Hot Slots - Wild Jackpot Winner
description:
Welcome to Hot Shot Slots

Try out your luck and spin the reels for a Wild Jackpot Win. This Vegas style slot machine gives you the most realistic casino slot experience. High payouts and tons of bonuses. You can't lose.

FEATURES:

-Beautiful graphics and sound effects.
- 8 exciting stages of play.
- Free Coins and Bonuses every hour.
- Free games and Bonuses during gameplay.
- 2up and 4up gamble and Bonus stage.

Thanks for playing and may Lady Luck be with you!
